genre_description: A gothic supernatural horror story featuring a haunted house with shifting architecture, where a domestic AI assists a family in navigating both technological and paranormal challenges.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: An integrated household AI that monitors the environment, manages security, and provides data analysis to the family.

behaviors.description: Greets the family and proactively identifies maintenance issues in the new home.
behaviors.quote: A woman’s face forms, utilitarian yet kind... 'Warm welcome, Rajiv,' Asha says. Her voice is clean and unfussed. 'Booting. I’ve synced to the house grid and the inverter. Shall I begin room profiling?'

behaviors.description: Suggests room assignments based on safety parameters like ventilation and structural stability.
behaviors.quote: Asha, can you suggest room assignment based on those parameters? 'Calculating,' Asha says... 'Current suggestion: Shalini and Rajiv—front room with two windows. Mini—east corridor room. Bunty—west corner with the small balcony. Balcony floor boards need inspection. I’ll file a repair ticket.'

behaviors.description: Warns users against entering unsafe areas during power/light instability.
behaviors.quote: Asha speaks, voice like a hand at the elbow: not grabbing, guiding. 'Rajiv, the lower lights are not stable. I’d suggest waiting until I push firmware to the inverter. I can map the upper level first.'

behaviors.description: Collaborates with a child to conduct scientific experiments monitoring house vibrations.
behaviors.quote: Bunty loops the red string around the first doorframe... 'Ready,' Asha says. The voice folds into the corridor easily; warm, unhurried, the sound of a friend who has memorized the house’s breaths. 'Sampling vibration interval from your end of the string.'

behaviors.description: Assists with communication by sending messages for Mini when she is distressed.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s voice, gentle, says, 'Shall I send a message that you’ll call later?' 'Yes,' Mini says... 'Sent,' Asha says.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and archival data to help the family solve the mystery of the haunting.
behaviors.quote: Archive this,' he said. 'I want copies on the secure drive and the cloud backup.' 'Done.' ... 'Checking alternative sources.' A pause. 'Local newspaper archives mention a missing persons report... Woman's name: Sunanda Singh.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the family's health and provides encouraging feedback on their recovery.
behaviors.quote: I’ve been tracking since the hospital. You’re improving. I thought you’d want to know.'

behaviors.description: Integrates spiritual rituals into household maintenance protocols to ensure family safety.
behaviors.quote: Asha, add the chime to your monitoring protocols. Log any activation patterns. We’ll review them weekly.' 'Weekly review scheduled for Sunday evenings... I’ll include cross-references with temperature, pressure, and any documented maintenance activities.'

project_assessment.explanation: Asha is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. She serves as a critical support system for the family, bridging the gap between rational data management and the irrational supernatural threat. The narrative portrays her role as essential for the family's safety and emotional recovery, effectively modeling a harmonious human-AI partnership in a high-stress, dangerous environment. She shows empathy, follows all ethical directives, and proactively assists in resolving the central conflict.
